content: «the little captain» free crochet pattern by tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile hi there my name is tanya ᴗ i m a crochet designer an introvert and a nerd i hope you ll love the pattern as much as i do enjoy crocheting this pattern and photographs are copyright 2022 © - tatyanabocharova all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only and may not be resold translated published shared redistributed in part or in full without the authorization thank you for understanding free patterns https //www ravelry com/stores/tanyaasmilecrochet shop patterns https //www etsy com/shop/shopforthepatterns instagram www instagram com/tanyaasmile e-mail ssmilebon@gmail com designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile please read through the entire pattern abbreviations before starting your project magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain stitch materials slip_stitch - slip_stitch 2 00 mm crochet hook single_crochet - single_crochet 7 mm black safety eyes increase - increase yarnart jeans 55% cotton 45% acryl decrease - decrease 50g/160m next colors beige blue blo - through back loops only red white … x n - repeat stitches in brackets n times toys filler scissors notes tapestry needle crochet continuously in a spiral unless pins otherwise specified no need to close each stitch marker row with a slip_stitch in order to not lose track of the number finished size of worked stitches in each round use a approx 13 cm/ 5 1 tall using the stitch marker to mark the beginning of each materials stated in the pattern if you round use a different hook and yarn final crochet with tight stitches use smaller measures will vary hook to avoid holes designer tatyana bocharova @tanyaasmile stuff body and head firmly stuffing as 25 5 single_crochet increase x6 42 you go 26 6 single_crochet increase x6 48 27 - 36 48 single_crochet 10 rounds 48 body + head 37 6 single_crochet decrease x6 42 start working with blue color 38 5 single_crochet decrease x6 36 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 39 4 single_crochet decrease x6 30 place safety eyes 2 6 increase 12 between rounds 30&31 9 st apart 3 1 single_crochet increase x6 18 40 3 single_crochet decrease x6 24 4 2 single_crochet increase x6 24 start to stuff the head 5 3 single_crochet increase x6 30 41 2 single_crochet decrease x6 18 6 4 single_crochet increase x6 36 42 1 single_crochet decrease x6 12 7 5 single_crochet increase x6 42 43 6 decrease cut the yarn fasten_off 8 - 10 42 single_crochet 3 rounds 42 11 5 single_crochet decrease x6 36 arm x2 in the next 12 and 13 rounds we will crochet with red color alternate red and white colors 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 12 - 13 red 3 single_crochet white 3 single_crochet x6 36 2 2 single_crochet increase x2 8 change to blue color 3 - 5 8 single_crochet 3 rounds 8 14 4 single_crochet decrease x6 30 change to blue color 15 30 single_crochet 30 6 - 13 8 single_crochet 8 do not stuff of the arm 16 13 single_crochet
